items.question: What is your return policy?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be unused and in original packaging. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.

items.question: How do I initiate a return?
items.answer: To initiate a return, log into your account, go to Order History, select the order, and click 'Return Items'. Follow the prompts to print a prepaid return label. Drop off the package at any authorized shipping location.

items.question: Can I get a refund for a defective product?
items.answer: Yes, defective products are eligible for a full refund or replacement, even outside the normal return window. Please contact us with photos of the defect and your order number.

items.question: How long does shipping take?
items.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping (2-3 days) and overnight shipping are also available for additional fees. Shipping times exclude weekends and holidays.

items.question: How can I track my order?
items.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also track your order by logging into your account and viewing Order History. Click on the order to see tracking details.

items.question: What if my package is lost or delayed?
items.answer: If your package hasn't arrived within the estimated delivery window, please contact us with your order number. We'll investigate with the carrier and either locate the package or send a replacement at no charge.

items.question: How do I reset my password?
items.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your email address, and we'll send you a password reset link. The link expires in 24 hours. If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder.

items.question: My account is locked. What should I do?
items.answer: Accounts are locked after 5 failed login attempts for security. Wait 30 minutes and try again, or use the 'Forgot Password' option to reset your password immediately.

items.question: Do you offer a warranty on products?
items.answer: Most products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship. Extended warranties are available for purchase on select items. Check the product page for specific warranty information.

items.question: How do I know if a product is in stock?
items.answer: Product availability is shown on each product page. If an item is out of stock, you can sign up for email notifications when it's back in stock. In-stock items typically ship within 1-2 business days.

items.question: When will I be charged for my order?
items.answer: Your payment method is charged when your order ships, not when you place the order. For pre-orders, you'll be charged when the item becomes available and ships.

items.question: I see a duplicate charge on my account. What happened?
items.answer: Duplicate charges are usually authorization holds that will drop off within 3-5 business days. If you see an actual duplicate charge after 5 days, contact us with your order number and we'll issue a refund immediately.

items.question: The product isn't working as expected. How do I troubleshoot?
items.answer: First, try restarting the product and checking all connections. Consult the user manual or online documentation for troubleshooting steps. If issues persist, contact our technical support team for personalized assistance.

items.question: Where can I find the user manual?
items.answer: User manuals are available on the product page under 'Documentation' or in your account under 'My Products'. You can also contact support to have a manual emailed to you.

items.question: Do you offer price matching?
items.answer: Yes, we match prices from authorized retailers for identical products. The competitor's price must be current and verifiable. Contact us within 14 days of purchase with proof of the lower price.

items.question: How do I contact customer support?
items.answer: You can reach us via live chat (available 9 AM - 6 PM EST), email at support@example.com, or phone at 1-800-SUPPORT. Average response time for email is 24 hours.
